boardgame.name: Las Edades de Oro
The Golden Ages
Goldene Zeitalter
boardgame.description: In The Golden Ages, you lead your civilizations through history. The game lasts four different eras, during which you develop technologies, create fine arts, erect buildings, and build wonders. You'll send explorers to discover the continents, found cities in distant lands, and send your soldiers into battles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first player starting a Golden Age during an era chooses a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;History Judgement_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card that states the way all the players will score in that round. Each player who started a Golden Age continues taking money at his turns until all other players have passed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are many ways to score points _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; artists, the judgement of history, wonders, technologies, attacks, money, secret future technologies, etc. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; as well as many different ways to achieve a victory. Will you succeed in evolving your civilization through history, overwhelming your opponents on the way to glory?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #18: The Golden Ages review, Onirim on tap, Onitama _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Best Treehouse Ever

This was my favourite of the games I played at Spiel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;14 last October. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a clever civilisation development game that has some familiar aspects, but puts everything together in a different way. There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s geography to cope with, resources to collect, technology to develop, cities to build and so on. Cracking stuff. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £27.50 (net of UK tax - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country). I charge shipping at cost and I can offer several options (or ask me to get a quote from couriers). To UK addresses: myHermes (2-3 working days, tracked) £3.98 Second class post (2-3 working days) £3.36 First class post (1 working day) £6.54 To other EU countries: Air mail (1 week or so) £14.77 Outside the EU: Air mail in Europe (1 week or so) £12.31 Air mail (about 1 week, no tracking) £19.60 (Australasia)/£18.05 (USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere) Surface mail (up to 8 weeks, no tracking) £12.11
